name: MacDonalds
desc: The price of MacDonanlds reflects its quality.

name: Nandos
desc: Nandos serves the kind of food that makes you want to dance after finishing your meal, the thighs have always been exceptionally juicy.

name: Sahara grill
desc: I would have the lambchops as my last meal because I wouldnt be able to sustain my finances after a portion.

name: Hakassan
desc: Your wallet will never forgive you and you'll always wish you had stuck to MacDonalds.

name: Pepes
desc: The chicken and rice is to die for.

name: Pho
desc: Pho offers all of the beautiful experiences of Vietnam including the surprises...of flavor.

name: Amorino
desc: This is overall my favorite Italian dessert place.
